title: WashU Expert: Arvidson on news that water still flows on Mars (Washington University in Saint ...
text: ( Source : Washington University in Saint Louis ) NASA/JPL / University of Arizona A GIF made up of repeated images taken by a camera aboard the Mars Reconnaissance Orbiter shows dark streaks that appear, lengthen and fade with the season.
